mapper.select: select fpcd.id, fpcd.claim_id, fc.order_number orderNumber, fc.order_title orderTitle, fpc.claim_number claimNumber, fpc.received_amount receivedAmount, fpc.undistributed_amount undistributedAmount, fpc.allocated_amount allocatedAmount, fpcd.amount from fc_payment_claim_detail fpcd left join fc_order fc on fc.id = fpcd.order_id left join fc_payment_claim fpc on fpc.id = fpcd.claim_id
